thread.title: Larry Miller
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Larry Miller

author: Larry Miller
title: Larry Miller
text:
loved the style and the selection. staff was very helpful. Assaad from
the Auburn store was very informative. The delivery was next day
The delivery team (Nick) were fast, careful of our wood floors. Extremely
polite!. Would recommend Gardner White to anyone.
